name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Prompt Search: ChatGPT, Google, and More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly search selected text with customizable prompts across ChatGPT, Google, and other services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Configure and manage your search prompts via the Settings page.
(Pages opened before installing this extension may not function correctly, please reload them.)

How to Use:

1. Search with Prompts via Context Menu and Hotkey:
- Select text on any webpage.
- Right-click to open the context menu.
- Press Q to open the prompt menu.
- Choose a prompt by pressing the first character of its name.

2. Search with Prompts via Extension Icon:
- Select text on any webpage.
- Click the extension icon.
- Choose a prompt from the menu.

3. Manage Prompts:
- On the Settings page, you can add, edit, or delete prompts.
- Click "Add Prompt" to create a new one.
- Customize each prompt with a unique name and URL format.

If you find this extension helpful, please rate it 5 stars.
